plot outline: Gopika (Kamalinee Mukherjee) is a sweet young doctor who give medical advice over the phone.She was not interested to settling down yet, she was pursuing her professional goal, until one day incidentally she get a call from Gopi (Venu Thottempudi), They started to talk via phone regularly, soon they fall in love with each other. In an interesting turn of event Gopi got injured by some bad guys and getting treatment from Gopika without recognizing each other. Will they finally recognize each other or go their separate ways?
title: Gopi Gopika Godavari
plot: Gopika (Kamalinee Mukherjee) is a sweet young doctor who give medical advice over the phone.She was not interested to settling down yet, she was pursuing her professional goal, until one day incidentally she get a call from Gopi (Venu Thottempudi), They started to talk via phone regularly, soon they fall in love with each other. In an interesting turn of event Gopi got injured by some bad guys and getting treatment from Gopika without recognizing each other. Will they finally recognize each other or go their separate ways?::Niaz Islam Arif
